name: HFT System C++ Dev Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libboost-all-dev libpq-dev libpqxx-dev libeigen3-dev libtbb-dev && wget https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v3.25.1/cmake-3.25.1-linux-x86_64.sh && chmod +x cmake-3.25.1-linux-x86_64.sh && sudo ./cmake-3.25.1-linux-x86_64.sh --prefix=/usr/local --skip-license && echo 'export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.bashrc
